forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of drizzle. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 57. West southwest wind around 14 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

forecast.name: Tuesday
forecast.shortForecast: Slight Chance Drizzle then Mostly Sunny
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of drizzle before 8am. Mostly sunny. High near 66, with temperatures falling to around 64 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 10 to 21 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

weather_report:
In the quiet embrace of the early morning, Downtown San Francisco sits beneath a blanket of clouds, teasing the promise of drizzle as the city prepares to awaken. The current temperature hovers comfortably around the mid-fifties, a gentle caress from the west-southwest wind, which sways through the streets at a steady pace. With a slight chance of moisture in the air, one might find the atmosphere delightfully fresh, hinting at the cleansing presence of the marine layer that clings to the coast.

As the day unfolds, optimism begins to peek through the layers of cloud. The sun is poised to break through, gradually revealing a world that will warm into the mid-sixties by midday. The wind, playful and invigorating, will dance between 10 to 21 mph, adding a spirited touch to the afternoon’s ambiance. For those who venture out, dressing in layers becomes essential. A light jacket will serve well against the cool morning air, while a breezy shirt beneath will be perfect for the anticipated warmth. A leisurely walk along the promenade might just be the ideal activity, where the scent of the ocean mingles with the thrill of a new day, inviting one to explore the hidden corners of this vibrant city.
